author: qu0b
content: do you need a blobschedule value for amsterdam in your genesis?

author: matkt0
content:
yes we need it . The same genesis as we have with kurtosis 
>  "amsterdamTime": 1759904931

author: matkt0
content:
for the moment you also need to disable transaction parallelization 
> --bonsai-parallel-tx-processing-enabled=false

content: Precompile handling was already discussed in earlier breakouts. Can you specify what you'd like to discuss? <@348512261955911691>

author: nero_eth
content: I requested some small changes to your PR, but looks good.

author: raxhvl
content:
I'm running `besu/v25.10-develop-b03bd66/linux-x86_64/openjdk-java-21` and I get the following error: 

```sh
E   pytest_plugins.consume.simulators.simulator_logic.test_via_engine.LoggedError: unexpected status on forkchoice updated to genesis: payload_status=PayloadStatus(status=<PayloadStatusEnum.SYNCING: 'SYNCING'>, latest_valid_hash=None, validation_error=None) payload_id=None
```

I have disabled parallel tx, is there anything else to be done on the hive side?

author: marchhill
content: just wanted to make the argument that we should exclude precompiles that are the target of CALL, EXTCODESIZE and EXTCODECOPY. looking at the code these don't actually touch the state so would be cleaner to not include them imo

author: sibkatya
content:
BALs metrics specs issue:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-metrics/issues/5

Would be great to collaborate with the clients to build an initial list and check the metrics on the dashboard. Feel free to comment and tag me on this.

author: raxhvl
content: I have added the test for net-zero balance transfer that was discussed in the breakout call today: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/2280

content:

